original_text: Take the sum of the sons of Kohath from among the sons of Levi, after their families, by the house of their fathers,
korean_text: 레위 자손 중에서 고핫 자손을 그들의 종족과 조상의 가문에 따라 집계할지니

sentences.original_text: Take the sum of the sons of Kohath
from among the sons of Levi
by the house of their fathers
